name: pnp-devproxy-minimal-dotnet-blazor
title: Minimal Blazor app using Dev Proxy
shortDescription: Demonstrates the minimal setup to use Dev Proxy with a Blazor WebAssembly application
longDescription: This sample demonstrates the minimal setup to use Dev Proxy with a Blazor WebAssembly application. It shows how to configure Dev Proxy to intercept API requests from a browser-based application and mock responses using the MockResponsePlugin with CORS headers. The sample makes a single API call to JSONPlaceholder and returns a mocked response, demonstrating how Dev Proxy intercepts and replaces the real API call. Perfect for getting started with Dev Proxy in Blazor projects.

thumbnails.alt: Dev Proxy mocking a Blazor WebAssembly app API request

references.name: Get started with the Dev Proxy
references.description: The tutorial will introduce you to the Dev Proxy and show you how to use its features.

references.name: Use Dev Proxy with client-side applications
references.description: Learn how to configure Dev Proxy to work with browser-based applications.

references.name: MockResponsePlugin documentation
references.description: The documentation of the MockResponsePlugin for the Dev Proxy.
